solution_line_template: A total of {monday_attendance} + {tuesday_attendance} + {wednesday_attendance} + {thursday_attendance} + {friday_attendance} = <<{monday_attendance}+{tuesday_attendance}+{wednesday_attendance}+{thursday_attendance}+{friday_attendance}={total_attendance}>>{total_attendance} people attended class across the 5 days
An average of {total_attendance} people / {number_of_days} days = <<{total_attendance}/{number_of_days}={average_attendance}>>{average_attendance} people per day attended class
